name: The Escape of Ed and Bean
name_original: The Escape of Ed and Bean
description:
A strange experiment deep in a secret lab goes horribly wrong.

Our dearest friend, (bean,) has been trapped within the second dimsion, so we, (Ed,) must take it upon ourselves to care for him while attempting to escape the lab.

Use Ed's super stregth and Bean's ability to fit through increadibly small spaces to escape the crumblin lab around you.

Created for the Baack-To-School Global Multiplayer Jam sponsored by Photon.

Ethan Gibson - Programmer
James Oakes - Programmer / Designer
Zane Webb - Designer
Sean Killian - Designer
